name: Thursday Nite Thunkin'
description:
I didn't notice until today but there are so many issues I need to fix with this game. Some I noticed before but didn't consider that serious, and some I just noticed when I finished the game
Things I gotta do:
-Fix all the cutscene bugs
-Change the hitbox in Level 6
-Add a progress bar in Levels 1, 2, 3 and 4
-Fix Level 3 score system (and collision and add death)
-Fix Level 1 timings
-Fix extra sound effect volume/times played
-Add control tutorials
Later:
-Add difficulties
IT'S TIME to Thunk on a Thursday Nite with the best rhythm game in 22 years! Follow Jim-Bob's day, which includes:
Six levels that all play differently! (Two coming soon in updates)
Uniquely animated cutscenes for each level, done in several different styles!
An entertaining story!
T.N.T. is pretty short, and will most likely only take around an hour to complete, which is why it's free. I doubt anybody would buy it if it costed money. But the whole TNTeam put a lot of effort into this game and we hope you enjoy it!
